input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath, 26-Inch

Item specifications:
Cedar, with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow
All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size
Suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area
This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath is a beautiful addition to your holiday decor. This 26-inch wreath is made of cedar, with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow. The stems are wired, so you can easily shape it to your liking. This wreath is suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area. It will add a touch of warmth to any room or door. The frosted winterberry wreath is the perfect way to welcome the season. Add a touch of warmth and charm to your home with this beautiful wreath.
input_text.Response B: This periodic beer glass and caffeine molecule mug set is perfect for every day, whether you're having coffee in the morning or beer at night. Nerd out with this awesome drinkware!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
